articles.author: John Hielscher
articles.title: Sarasota-Manatee home prices could sink - Sarasota Herald-Tribune
articles.description: The Sarasota-Manatee region ranks fifth nationwide for the risk of home price declines.
articles.content:
The Sarasota-Manatee region ranks fifth nationwide for the risk of home price declines.
After nearly a decade of steady growth, home prices in the Sarasota-Manatee region stand a 50-50 chance of dro… [+2646 chars]
